reviews.review: The cake is not a lie
Un juego genial, a pesar del tiempo siempre queda una nueva forma de sacar algún logro o buscar algún bug... Y a pesar de los años sigue dando horas de diversión

Неустаревающая классика, разобранная на мемы культовая игра. Короткая, но запоминающаяся, эта головоломка полна чёрного юмора и заданий,требующих «портального» мышления. Если есть ещё люди, не игравшие в эту прелесть — максимально рекомендую.
This is, quite simply, one of the best video games ever made.  The writing and mechanics were above and beyond anything else at the time.

7/10

Short, because from three to five hours and someone has finished a finite phase of testing (The main part of the game), along with advanced maps. I think it is worth paying those 30 cents to the set with the second part during the discounts*. I will say that you can sit through this time and do not notice when it is gone, because when someone plays this game for the first time, it can turn really on.

* Only when the sale price is worthly, because it is the introductory part of the more interesting Portal 2, and there is no sense to spend on it the mountains of penalties.

Quel incroyable jeu !!!! Une immersion totale est très bien faite de la part de Valve, et il fait beaucoup tourner la tête !

Je le recommande !!!
Great game, that makes you think logically. Need more of them.

Jeu très cool pour les aspects du gameplay et des graphismes (même s'il date déjà d'il y a longtemps).
Par contre il est un peu court, dommage.

9/10

Maravilloso juego. Es una fórmula nunca antes vista e inovadora. Buena historia, buena banda sonora y buen diseño de niveles aunque algo fáciles y en ocasiones repetitivos (pero muy poco). La única pega que le pongo es su escasa duración (Me ha durado unas 3h contando pausas y casi no me atasqué en los puzles más de 5 mins). El precio es algo elevado en cuanto a su breve duración (cuando llegué a la batalla final pensé que el juego iba a continuar). Lo mejor es pillarlo en unas rebajas y disfrutarlo.

Portal is truly an unassuming kind of game, what with it's seemingly simple story and the lack detail. However, the further you go, the more eerie things get, with a good twist and some ingenious ideas. I would have appreciated some more "long jumping" and chain jumping, but overall, Valve did a lovely job!

Its a great Singleplayer game, just give it a try!
Of course the campaigne isn´t very long but you´ll love it for what it is.
A little try to do something new!

You´ll love it so you will try the secound part!

You wanna play the third part but than you remember "Valve can´t count to three, well fuck!" Now you gonna wait till you die for the third part...

But try it!  ;) :D
Great game, must buy for any gamer and worth it if its in a bundle.
This game has to be a great game to play when you're bored and just want a calmig puzzle expirince!
simplemente una historia muy buena y unos niveles algunos que otros mas complicados y ya ni te digo conseguir los logros jajaj
An awesome game that everyone should experience. Not the standard game you expect.
One of the best puzzle games on steam for sure 10/10
Melhor do que eu esperava asudhausdh
эта игра заслуживает победы потому что в этой игре есть испытания порталы и паркур
Cara esse jogo é tão satisfatório que nem sei explicar.

Ein abwechslungsreiches Spiel für zwischendurch ! 
Portal verbindet ein Adventure- und Rätselspiel mit seinem ,,eigenen" und ganz besonderen Humor auf eine
interessante und gut gelungene Weise !
Tolles Spiel und daher auf jeden Fall weiterzuempfehlen !
первые дырки в которые я зашёл
Одна из лучших игр вольво, я даже маслину не словил
Been meaning to play for a long time... got it because of the sale. Does not disappoint!
"O que raios eu faço agora?", é a frase que vc vai mais usar nesse jogo.
Крутая игра на логику нужно думать

Гра пречудова. Просто на кілька годин залип!
Тепер перепройду стільки разів, скільки буде необхідно!!!!
Портал 2, я іду за тобою!!1!!
하프라이프 시리즈와 포탈, 팀포가 들어있는 The Orange Box를 2100원에 구매해서 즐겼습니다. 어우 어지럽고 짜증나고 멀미나고 이런 장르는 첨 접하는데 꽤 할만 했습니다. 포탈 플탐 2시간 나오네요. 2시간 순삭 했습니다. 포탈2도 1580원에 구매해놨습니다. 포탈2는 멀티가 된다니 더욱 더 기대가 됩니다.!
Undying classic and work of art. I may have completed it dozens of times but I still come back from time to time to add one more to the counter. Definitely a must-play for all videogame lovers.
I just wish I could erase my memories of this game to be able to play it over and over as if it was the first time. Funny, entertaining and makes you want more and more.

Finished the game in almost 2 hours. I was expecting more. Probably because I played quite a lot of Portal 2 before playing this one. Well it was still very much worth my 1€ for sure haha. Great game! Too bad that Valve is no longer a gaming company, because they really have the abilities neccessary to create such masterpieces. To be absoltely honest, I would rather prefer Portal 3 over Half Life 3... I liked this game more than I loved Half Life. Sue me.
Одна нога здесь, другая - там (с) GLaDOS
The only game i will describe as perfect

Great game, amazing story and awesome puzzles.

Don't forget to eat the cake.
Play it, don't ask questions, just play it.
This game is just great, no more to say. Best 2 - hour game you`ll ever play.....
Uno dei capolavori migliori di Valve, esso integra ad una trama ben scritta un gameplay intrattenente e ragionevolmente complesso.
It's cheap, fun, and a blast to speedrun. You've probably already bought it.

真的很棒的一款遊戲
趁著秋季特賣入手拉~~
一二代的結局音樂我都很喜歡
真的很值得推薦的遊戲
I just love this game and the franchise
Φοβερό παιχνίδι πολύ πρωτότυπο αξίζει να το αγοράσετε !!!

Durante años, casi podría decir que rehui el jugar a este título. Parecía no concordar con los fps al  uso a los que yo solía jugar. Por suerte, me equivoqué. Portal es un enorme juego, difícil hasta cierto punto, y dotado de una muy expresiva y marcada personalidad. Obviamente mucho de ello le sobreviene gracias a GlaDos, la voz de la inteligencia artificial, siempre presente y dispuesta para ironizar r histrionizar nuestro avance. Tanto el diseño de lss trampas como los propios niveles, son muy dignos de recordar. Para mí es desde ya uno de los imprescindibles, un título a tener muy en cuenta en tu biblioteca. De 10.
近十年最好的第一人称解密游戏只有两个，一个是传送门，一个是传送门2。极具创意的关卡设计，极富哲理的剧情，V社的三大神作之一，装steam必买的游戏之一。
A very short but enjoyable puzzle game that sets up the fantastic portal 2
Porque todas las cuentas de Steam deberían tener este videojuego.
A história do game apesar de ser curta é fantástica!!! Simplesmente incrível! É um jogo necessário na coleção de qualquer um, ainda mais se estiver em promoção!!!
Muy buen juego de puzzles, de lo mejor.

ゲームに対する考え方が変わりました。本当に凄いです。

игра вообще класс я GLaDOS порошол со второй попытки
